page.title: 04THE CINEMA
page.content: There is a new cinema in Huntingdon called{'The Cromwell'.}The entrance fee is Â£1.00 for children and Â£2.00 for adults.A popular film will be screened regularly for up to two months. These are some of the films that have been shown recently:- { Ghostbusters { Never Ending Story { Passage To India Half way through the film there is an interval during which you can buy drinks and confectionaries etc. During the interval and before the film begins advertisments are shown for local businesses and music is played. There is also a{Saturday club}for young people run in connection with the cinema.
